short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly preview, open, and manage tabs with intuitive hover previews and click-to-open functionality.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabWizard revolutionizes your browsing experience by offering a seamless way to preview, open, and manage your tabs. 

Whether you're juggling multiple projects or just browsing casually, TabWizard makes tab management effortless and intuitive.

It provides quick access to all open tabs, allowing you to easily navigate and switch between them. 

Key features:
1-Customize key binds to make the popup appear and disappear.
2-New Tab Creation: Press the plus icon (+) to instantly open a new tab, keeping your browsing smooth and uninterrupted.
3-Popup Previews: Hover over any tab's text or icon to display a popup preview of the tab content, letting you see what's inside without switching tabs.
4-Popup Window Opening: Left-click on the text or icon to open the tab in a popup window, providing a quick and focused view of the content.
5-Quick Tab Switching: Right-click on the text or icon to switch directly to the corresponding tab, making navigation faster and more efficient.
6-Easy Tab Closing: Middle-click on the text or icon, or press the 'X', to close the tab with ease, keeping your browser organized.
7-History Integration: Press 'Load from history' to add tabs from your browsing history to the popup, ensuring you can always return to important pages even when closed.
